text: ao banda anak del mean chomnue. chaur puok anak chhlaeyotb champoh a l laoh ning anakneasar nowpel delke ban ampeavneav puok anak tow rk avei delke thveu aoy puok anak rsa laengvinh( daertam meakra nei sa sa- nea ai sla m) . chaur puok anak chreab tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh ach reareang rveang mnoussa ning chetd robsa ke( del bngobrathnea) haey pit brakd nasa puok anak nung trauv ke bramoulophdom towkean trong vinh
